common_0290_head_teacher_01: Excellent. It seems everyone is here.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_02:
Well then, it’s time that I explained your
independent study assignment.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_03: As usual, the theme will be “A Treasure Hunt”![npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_04:
I ask each of you to set out and travel the world
in search of your own treasure.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_05:
You have all learned much within the walls of our
fine academy...[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_06:
But now it is time to turn your eyes upon the
wider world and deepen your understanding.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_07:
Explore Paldea’s abundant nature, soak in its
rich culture...[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_08: discover the Pokémon that live here...[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_09: and get to know the people, too.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_10:
Where will you travel? Who will you meet?
And what will you achieve?[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_11:
Of course, your Pokémon partners will be there
to help you.[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_14: share each other’s thoughts and feelings...[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_15: and find something you might always treasure![npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_16:
I look forward to welcoming you all back after
your independent study...[npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_17: when you return to us as fine young Trainers![npcn:A]
common_0290_head_teacher_18: Let the Treasure Hunt begin! Onward![npcn:A]
